text: Uri (Uri) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 3,009 people lived there. Its area is 56.81 kmÂ².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 150 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Uri, Sardinia
